website_summaries.verdict: Armed with a powerful processor and Amazon's exhaustive content library, the Kindle Fire HDX delivers incredible value for its price, especially for Amazon Prime members.
pros: Amazon's Kindle Fire HDX 7 is a performance monster that speeds through Web sites and UI pages at a frantic pace
The screen is impressively sharp and the small light design is comfy for reading books
Mayday is personal and near-instant customer service
Some small but smart UI changes lead to an overall more pleasant experience
cons: The remote video viewing feature isn't ready at launch and ad removal still costs an extra $15
16GB is too small for 1080p movies and there's no built-in storage expansion
The screen is tarnished by a yellowish tint and the buttons on the back are sometimes hard to find
No Google Play access means many apps still aren't available

customer_reviews.author: TeeKay

customer_reviews.title: She was also amazed by all the things it can do
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Kindle for my daughter's birthday. She was totally shocked and could not wait to try it. She was also amazed by all the things it can do, especially downloading books, movies and tv shows. She received many presents this year, but the Kindle Fire was her favorite. It is hard to impress a 39 year-old woman who I bought a laptop on her last birthday. Might as well throw that in the trash. The Kindle Fire HD does everything except walk her dog. She also loved the purple cover/stand I purchased with it. It arrived the Friday before her birthday which was Sunday. Neither of us could be happier with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Delta C

customer_reviews.title: Save your money buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this Kindle for less than a year and it is the biggest disappointment. The longer I use it the more dysfunctional it becomes. It shuts down while I'm reading, will go back to the home screen without warning, and the screen will freeze. It is so frustrating. I read reviews before I bought this and hoped that the things people were saying had been fixed, they have not. I would not recommend this to anyone. The longer I have the worse it performs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, no...
customer_reviews.text: Sorry Amazon, love you as a store, but your tablet is WAY too proprietary! This is not a true android device; it may have that at its core, somewhere, but there's just too much "Amazon shell" between the user and the OS; it can't play anything off google play, can't even access it without a 3rd party app, many android apps have issues or won't run due to not having google services installed... this feels less like a tablet and more like a "Amazon Store Shopping Companion"; everything on it is geared towards helping people buy products from Amazon, rather than enjoying the freedom and open-source nature of Android.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Slow, not durable and no customer service.
customer_reviews.text: First this kindle had two advertisements to go through. Now it has only a unlock screen. But it has gotten so slow I can take a bath before it get any where. The real problem is with e-books. Trying to download book from my library which now has to go through Amazon can literally take overnight. Amazon has no way to get human help any more either. My last kindle quit working when the mini plug for re charging wouldn't lock into place. Now I'm having the same problem. These don't last very long. I won't buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love my 7" HDX kindle fire! It is the perfect size to carry everywhere and it works wonderful. No problems, very fast with downloads and I love the simplicity of the device! I also own an I pad and I feel 7" HDX is more versatile and costs so much less! The picture is stunning and the sound is great with or without ear plugs. I am so glad I bought it. I use the amazon cloud to store movies and books I have purchased. It works great with Amazon prime and the videos that I download and borrow for free or rent or buy!
customer_reviews.author: D. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Kindle fire HDX
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about a year and a half now. For one I like the hdx, better than any of the other kindle fire tablets that have come out so far. I did notice with this particular tablet that I have the 64g with AT&T, it likes to shut itself off randomly. It only happens occasionally, it's not an update thing or anything like that, it just does it. That is the only downfall to this one tablet in particular. I do hope they come out with another HDX or one better this year.
customer_reviews.author: TLee

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I brought my old Kindle Fire HDX 7 out of the mothballs after purchasing the New Kindle Fire HD 2015 edition. I was greatly disappointed with the new ones. The microphone in my HDX is broken(found out when trying to access Mayday!) There is also some smudging on the screen. (It was my go to, carry around the house with me device) I've been using it again though and am thrilled that it is on sale for 150 during today's Deals.
customer_reviews.author: C. BUTLER

customer_reviews.title: Kindle Power problem
customer_reviews.text: The Kindle tech says I need a software update $129 and a new Power adapter. He says I have over Charged the device. As an Electronic Engineer I find that alarming. I have a device with a power cord supplied by the same Company and I HAVE over charged the device. Is it possible for the Manufacture to supply a Power device that does not shut off when the Kindle is completely charged. It makes no sense to me an Electronic Engineer. The most logical problem is something in the Kindle NOT stopping the charger input. One would expect the charger to stop sending power to the device when it was fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Theda L.

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet! As a Mac user, I had to download the Android File Transfer application onto my computer in order to add books, music, etc. to my Kindle Fire HDX. After that, it was just drag and drop what I wanted into the appropriate folders and I was ready to go. Amazon also has a really good selection of free game apps for the Kindle. It is easy to navigate the different types of downloaded items and there is a carousel with the most recently opened items, so you can go back to work on several different things. This was a very good buy!
customer_reviews.author: ZenJack

customer_reviews.title: Slow and Unreliable keeps freezing up.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Kindle that I have had. I don't know if it is a factory defect or what but this one is slower and will give me a black screen and the only way to get back to the Kindle is to power off and power back up I am very frustrated with this purchase. I called customer service and they called me back in 30 minutes but nothing has changed. I use Amazon for just about everything and love them but this Kindle HDX 7 is a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I love my Kindle
customer_reviews.text: 3 years and still going. I love my Kindle. I really hope it will last another 3 years. This is my go-to device. I watch movies and TV shows, listen to music while reading, sometimes surf. My only con is that I wish I had purchased the 32 GB. I can only keep so many books on here. I tend to delete books when I'm done reading them. I still have room, but I can't keep all my books and had to delete apps. So mine is still working.
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: Finally decided to upgrade for better display
customer_reviews.text: This is an older model but I finally bought one and I love it! I have a 2nd gen Fire and it's nice and all (just repurposed it) and the newest Fires are less expensive but this one (still) has the best display and that's a big part of why I wanted to upgrade in the first place. I waited and waited for new announcements but this went on special and I couldn't wait any longer. It's been great so far with obvious improvements all around besides the gorgeous display. I couldn't be happier with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, all that is out there
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in 2014, had to return it three times with thank goodness my warranty thingy, and stopped using it in October 2016, because it stopped working. It would of been too expensive to fix. So for paying for this buying a new cord and a new adapter I spent a lot of money and only got 5.00 back when i turned it in. It was easy to use though and easy to navigate and to carry around.I haven't tried anything else out there, but so much handier tan my laptop. So I know I will purchase another type later just that the place where you plug your cord in is very flimsy and doesn't last
customer_reviews.author: Chooliki

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect it to last like an iPad
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with my kindle. Only 2 years old and it died on me after a software update. Now it won't boot up and Amazon Lack of Support online or by phone is shocking. I was a happy kindle user and now a shock disappointed user with a $300 useless paperweight. Why is there no method to connect it to a computer and reinstall the OS or troubleshoot why it stuck in [fastboot] screen for hours. This kindle was very well cared for with a nice cover and screen protector. If you have a working kindle, don't accept the software upgrade. It will break your tablet. Just saying what happen to my kindle
customer_reviews.author: S. Fong

customer_reviews.title: Still better than the new Kindle Fires!
customer_reviews.text: This particular tablet came out in 2013 and is faster, better quality, and has a MUCH MUCH nicer screen than any of the new Kindle fires including the HD series. On top of that you can find it cheaper than the HD 8.
customer_reviews.author: EchoPacific

customer_reviews.title: Nice gadget, with some issues.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with any wireless device beyond simple cell phones and a 3G Internet connection for my desktop PC. I've had it only for a couple of weeks and it was disappointing at first; those "free" Wi-Fi hotspots --- at least in my area --- aren't so free, for one thing. For another the total lack of any kind of manual, even a downloadable one, made the Kindle a beautiful mystery. I've since acquired a "Mi-Fi" device and can now connect anywhere at 4G speeds. Good enough. I'm still a bit mystified but it's beginning to come together. This is a good buy, but access to a manual would make it much better.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Martos

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for mobility, is very fast for navigation and the screen has amazing resolution!!. The price is the best of its segment. The app store still short in applications but every day is getting bigger. Is easy to use for any person. Only two points: first, only can use the amazon app store to download apps, and second, please, need Adobe connect to be perfect for work. PD: If you are ios fan or Android fan, and need an excesive quantity of applications, buy another tablet, but If you need a device easy to use, fast, light, with a Creta price and with excelent performance for multimedia, this is your tablet¡¡¡
customer_reviews.author: german vasquez

customer_reviews.title: This is an Awesome device. I don't know why they stopped making ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an Awesome device. I don't know why they stopped making it. It is the perfect resolution and the perfect size. And you can download HD prime content for offline watching.
customer_reviews.author: Chester

customer_reviews.title: Great hardware, lousy software
customer_reviews.text: The Kindle Fire HDX 7" features great hardware (snappy CPU, lots of RAM), a gorgeous screen, and a price that undercuts competitors. At the right price, it's a downright steal. Everything integrates perfectly with Amazon's ecosystem (Prime, Instant Video, Kindle). Unfortunately, everything else about it is decidedly mediocre. The Fire OS is clunky and obtuse, and prone to random crashes fixed only by powering down. The app selection is pathetic compared to everything except maybe the Windows App Store, making its useful very limited beyond simple web surfing, email, and Amazon movies or books. It's not really an Android-based tablet, and Amazon can't compete on the software side with Apple, putting the great hardware in the Fire HDX to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Tango-Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The volume toggle does not work well at all, which is very irritating. Other than that, it's OK. Update: I just removed a star because, right in the middle of watching something, the sound stopped working entirely. I have tried everything to get it back, but nothing works. It is essentially worthless to me now. Since it worked passably (but not great) for a couple of years, I decided two stars instead of three was fair. I have always regretted getting the model with the advertisements because they have gotten so much more intrusive over the years.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tunes

customer_reviews.title: Great Kindle!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Kindle and I love it! For the longest time, I didn't see a use for one. I had already bought a 10" Samsung tablet, so why would I need another one? Here's why: *weight-so much lighter than my Samsung tablet *streaming-the display is so much sharper *touch screen-the screen is very touch-sensitive so I don't have to tap the screen so many times The only thing that I slightly bothersome is that when I read books, the sepia selection seems to have a faint border. Otherwise, I love it and can't do without it! I look forward to purchasing a larger tablet from Kindle, too.
customer_reviews.author: ak

customer_reviews.title: Charger design is awful!
customer_reviews.text: The plug/charge design on this is awful and as a consumer, I wonder if this design is on purpose to eventually fail to make you buy a new one. When you are charging this device, the plug sits at an angle. Anyone with children can see that this will get damaged eventually. Now I have a kindle that I cannot charge.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good device, but the restrictions are bad
customer_reviews.text: The device is fine. But I think someone should tell Amazon that, since you bought it, it's not its device anymore. I mean, you have no freedom with your fire. It's an android device, but you can download only apps selected by amazon, so you will lose one of the best feature of androids, the plenty of apps. You can't change your wallpapers, too. It seems not a big deal, but who own the kindle? I paid for it, so I'd like to be free to download my stuff and to personalize my device. If you would like it too, I recommend another device.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Campos

customer_reviews.title: Loses 3G/4G network connectivity regularly
customer_reviews.text: The problems with 3G/4G network connectivity are well-documented for this device. We are only a few months out of warranty and Amazon will not support their device. The fix for the connectivity we discovered on our own -- it was interference from the case it was in. (Note this was an official case approved for the device sold by Amazon) The volume buttons on the outside of the Fire no longer work, however. A reset did not fix this problem. And they do not repair their own devices, so even if we wanted to pay for a repair it is not available through the very company selling the devices. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: kalysonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I did not want another kindle 8!
customer_reviews.text: I like my 7! However it failed and I sent it back for repair or replacement. The li duo recieved is an 8, I already have one and didn’t like it. I then purchased the seven hd like the one I had dropped and shattered. I didn’t want another kindle 8. I paid quite a bit more for the one that I returned and want to send this back for a refund unless you have one like the one that I purchased. Not satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty display but too many connectivity problems.
customer_reviews.text: While I was very impressed with the color and clarity of the HDX's display, connectivity problems ultimately compelled me to return the device to Amazon. I suspect the main culprit behind the connectivity woes was AT&T but with Amazon and AT&T pointing their fingers at one another, it was impossible to determine where the fault lay and thus, how to fix the 4G LTE connectivity issue. Additionally, I tried using the Mayday feature of the device, which is neat in concept but in practice, terrible. The support agent was difficult to understand and seemed interested in going through her script as fast as possible. Maybe there are better reps, but I was certainly disappointed with the one assigned to me.
customer_reviews.author: A Common Widget

customer_reviews.title: Never without it...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my Kindle Fire HDX & I don't go anywhere without it. I've not been a huge fan of audiobooks in the past but I do love the narration option available to some books so I can switch to listening if I'm interrupted & need to multi-task. The Bluetooth option is fantastic because I can continue with my book while driving. The battery lasts a long time & I can go the whole day without needing to recharge even while browsing the Web & using the voice narration option wich would reasonably cause the battery to drain more quickly. It's my absolute favorite device (favored over my phone or tablet) & I'm never without it.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: I'm using this for 6 years and still works fine, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this for 6 years and still works, but Hulu, amazon app, ... are no longer supported on this device :( They should be supported, not sure why??!
customer_reviews.author: Vulture1991

customer_reviews.title: My favorite HDX kindle
customer_reviews.text: I was so glad to find this one. My other Kindle I dropped it on it's side & she cracked. Yikes! It said something about a sim card instead of usual AT&T symbol so took it to AT&T store was able to replace sim card from old kindle.Didn't know it had a sim card. It's on side where earphone goes. New kindle has more memory. I love my HDX kindle. I watch movies & tv shows have a ton of books.Also audio books for meditation. Can't live without it. Thank you for having this one to replace broken one.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: My fourth Kindle and its Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth kindle and my second Fire Kindle, that said this product is AMAZING! (Shouting intended) I use computers, an iPad, and my iPhone, all day. For reading there are hard and tiring on your eyes. For none business reading I use the Kindle. FYI, I impressed by the spead. Mostly, I use the Kindle for reading but I have tried a few games, movies, photos, to check out the product. The photos look better on the Kindle that on any other device I've used. That was totally unexpected. But a shookingly lovely surprise. PS: Have readers in your circle or freinds and family?....Kindles make great gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great tablet for a kid
customer_reviews.text: We bought this tablet for our son, with the kids shockproof case. Almost one year after purchasing the tablet, my son (7 years old) dropped it and there was a hairline crack. Amazon fully replaced the tablet for us, no questions asked. What a great tablet for a kid. This has been perfect for him. We are apple product people but have been pleasantly surprised with this product. The only reason I give this 4 stars and not 5 is because the case makes it a little hard to use the touch screen at times. Although, I seem to be the only one with the problem. Of course the 7 year old has it down. LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Another perfect reader
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Kindle Fire. I have had so many of the different Kindle's from Amazon and each one has been a plus on the good side and a major enjoyment. My new Fire is fabulous, and works well, is perfect for watching videos, and does so much that I am still exploring it. I love all of Amazon's devices and no matter what comes next, I will be on the ride for the perfect tablet or ereader and while I am an avid Amazon person, I also go by the outstanding support and customer support that is and always has been available. Thank you Amazon for being such an extraordinary company to purchase from!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Froze Up At 14 Months---Avoid
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for 14 months, no issues. The warranty is for 12 months. At 14 months out of the blue while listening to Amazon Prime Music, it froze. Called Amazon who was unable to help. Was told I'd be called back and if it couldn't be fixed, I would be given a discount. No one called and when I called back I was treated like I was trying to pull a fast one. HORRENDOUS customer service. Think we will switch to an IPad mini since they last longer than 14 months and have better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: A Bit of a Let-Down
customer_reviews.text: This is almost the tablet I wanted it to be. But there are just too many issues. 1. It freezes up for no reason. This is a basic software problem and I don't know why Amazon can't seem to get it straightened out. 2. The Music Player doesn't support gapless playback. Most MP3 players fixed this problem ten years ago. That means the Kindle Fire HDX is only caught up to pre-2003 iPods. That's disgraceful. 3. Ads, ads, and more ads. There's one thing this device EXCELS at, and that's throwing advertisements at you. I wish Amazon worked as hard at making a good device as they do advertising to you once you've bought the device
customer_reviews.author: Robert Koehl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect so far.
customer_reviews.text: Only had it since September 3rd but so far it's wonderful. I love the HDX. My other one's battery is finally going and I needed to keep it plugged in all the time. All my things transferred great. Even my Silk bookmarks which shocked me. This was exactly like new.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: awesome little tablets at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I own both the 8.9 hdx and the hdx 7, I love them both. they are great little tablets. I love to read on the small one and I like watching movies on the larger ones. I bought both from amazon warehouse and will continue to buy more items from them since they are always as described and have fast prime delivery. they are always in great shape and seem to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Why doesn't Amazon make these anymore?
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is still going strong, but I do not understand why Amazon isn't making high resolution HDX anymore. Sad that they abandoned the market, as I would happily buy a new one like this one.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good service on a replacement of a failed model after warranty
customer_reviews.text: I have this product because my first Kindle Fire screen failed after the warranty period. I was given the option of a $30 discount on this model, but could not get a discount on the model that had failed which was less expensive. It seems to be faster than my former model. Images are crisp. I a not a fan of the camera which apparently only does selfies as the lens is on the screen side. Pictures are not that sharp, either. A selfie fanatic could probably have a lot of fun with it. Other than the limited options for obtaining a replacement with discount, the service I received was excellent, and shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: HDX 7 Acceptable Surprise Gift with Simple Set Up
customer_reviews.text: This was a retirement gift and I had to cancel my order of the HD7 with front/back camera and video. The front Skype/Face Time camera is not to my liking. Did watch one movie and now curious about other features. Bright, sharp screen with excellent sound. Very helpful info during movie when screen touched, even if I did not intend to activate feature. Easy instructions. Very easy to connect my email accounts. Wonder if I will regret not having 32 GB when I finally learn to make full use of the HDX. The 7" screen is acceptable. Thoughtful gift but the cheaper simpler HD7 Tablet would have fit my lifestyle just fine.
customer_reviews.author: M.T. Jones

customer_reviews.title: a better, stronger WIFI would be nice
customer_reviews.text: It's time for Amazon to upgrade the Kindle!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Other tablets do so much more Other than placing orders at Amazon, reading books , listening to music, and sharing pictures there is bot much that's very exciting, Time for higher resolution front and rear facing cameras, A SD slot to expand memory and to transfer and acquire info. a better, stronger WIFI would be nice. Most of all how about being able to make a face time call NOT Skype!!! use your useless smart phone abilities and incorporate them into the tablet. Better processor (as good as any (desktop) And a 4K Screen. Incorporate Echo into the tablet as well. Come on Amazon!!! You can do it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan E. Sodomin

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't sure I'd use it.. but now I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: Let's start this by saying that I have a fancy pants smart phone that I carry with me everywhere. This is what kept me from purchasing this device for so long. I finally decided to try it, noting the 30 day money back option. I got it on Tuesday and love it! My fancy pants smart phone is now used for making calls and taking photos (it has a MUCH better camera than the Kindle has!) and the Kindle is used for everything else, when wi-fi is available. The special offers are actually a benefit, in my mind! Looking forward to some great deals!
customer_reviews.author: starrrie

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet,  Shame it is  Glued  to  Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The Tablet itself is nice, but there is one caveat It's an Amazon sell device. Amazon is trying to push it's software and product with this tablet, and it actively blocks the installation of services like Google Play. It would be no issue if the Amazon App store were competent , it's not. I got this as a present and felt cheated by the fact that they are actively blocking such services for no other reason than a marketing strategy, without offering you a similar service. The tablet will go to my son (7 y/o) and I will buy myself something that is not a portable commercial popping device for myself.
customer_reviews.author: The Lummox

customer_reviews.title: Love them all
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought a Kindle Fire for my grandchild and that was 4 years ago and she still has it and uses it every day. I also back in the winter bought a Kindle Paperwhite for me which I love. My 86 yr old mother lives with me and she loves to read but has macular degeneration and so it is difficult for her to see the print. I gave her the Kindle Paperwhite and she is in heaven. So that left me with nothing. I had to have the Kindle Fire Absolutely love it. Best thing I have purchased in a long time. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Hummingbirdsong3

customer_reviews.title: 12.5 month old and unit died.  Just barely outside of the warranty period.  A sad end to a nice device.
customer_reviews.text: First this model is far superior that the previous version. It was great until it's 11 month then began to have significant application issue. Apps crashed often but could be restarted and used. Now at the 12.5 month mark the until has fully shut down and will not turn on. Worse this is .5 month beyond the warranty period for the product which mean Amazon offer no support whatsoever on it. This is hugely disappointing! Not even a RMA is offered on this device. Just a sad end to a truly nice device.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: best gift for my 12 year old son ever.
customer_reviews.text: This Kindle fire hd was a gift for my son , Ibbought it because I am not a technology savie person so I could not help him at but this Kindle Fire Hd He just goes taps an I con and he get a live Kindle rep and she updated his tabled and best of she he walked away from that and said mom amazons people are better ,way more friendlier then any store we have ever been in. Thanks Amazon for treating my son like I treat him with a great deal of respect. You are in my book the number 1 place to shop for everything.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Charging issues and unauthorized service fees.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Kindle Fire HDX last year around July. I have already been through 2 of them. My first one, the casing was extremely loose. The second one, the charging port does not work. We take extreme care with our devices. There should be no reason it won't charge. I also have an issue with the fact that Amazon keeps charging me services fees without my knowledge considering I don't purchase anything for the Kindles. My very first Kindle Fire I got back in 2010 had same charging port problems. Sorry to say, I won't be buying another Kindle anytime soon. I am not too happy with the Kindle or Amazon's services.
customer_reviews.author: M. Baron

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second of this type of kindle, the first from five years ago would have still been around if I had not broken it! I love this kindle, I read picture books to my kids on it all the time and the screen is big enough to read and see the pics for all three of us!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Becker

customer_reviews.title: Not able to update to Fire OS 5 and instal Google Store
customer_reviews.text: The system is stuck at Fire OS 4 and unable to upgrade. Fire OS 4 cannot install google play framework without rooting. I bought it and returned.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel
